dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hi there! I'm new to this game. Can you tell me what it's about?

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Of course! This game is a fantasy RPG where you explore a vast world, complete quests, and battle fearsome creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: That sounds exciting! Can I choose a character class?

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Absolutely! You can choose from various classes like warrior, mage, and rogue. Each class has unique abilities and playstyles.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Great! I think I'll go with the rogue class.

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: Excellent choice! Rogues excel in stealth and agility. They are perfect for sneaking past enemies and dealing massive damage with their daggers.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I can't wait to start playing! Where do I begin?

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: You'll start your journey in the town of Oakshire. Head to the tavern to meet other adventurers and pick up your first quest.
